title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 814.7 - Signed receipt for shipment-release prohibited
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 814.7 - Signed receipt for shipment-release prohibited

State Regulations

No delivery acknowledgement on any shipping document to
be signed by the consignee at time of delivery shall contain language which
purports to release or discharge the carrier or its agents from liability other
than a statement that the property has been received in apparent good condition
except as noted on the shipping documents. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
814.7

Adopted

New

York State Register August 3, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 31, eff. 8/3/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
